document_data.name: Treacle Tart
document_data.mainbody: '''Treacle tarts''' were a variety of [[tart]]-like pies made with a liquid, uncrystallized [[sugar]] syrup.
document_data.Description: Treacle tarts were a very sweet variety of dessert with even its breadcrumbs being sticky with molasses.
document_data.Availability: The tarts were commonly made and sold across the [[Chionthar Valley]], on the river's north shore, as well as in the eateries of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
